titles: A king and no king Acted at the Globe, by his Maiesties Seruants. Written by Francis Beamount, and Iohn Flecher.
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625. aut
publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Thomas Walkley, and are to bee sold at his shoppe at the Eagle and Childe in Brittans-Bursse,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Dyce Library, Victoria and Albert Museum.
